item.title: Assignment 2
item.description: Upload your assignment to the Blackboard link for “Assignment 2” by April 8 April 10. Tasks Write at least one sentence each about the following: a. What problem does Bayes’s rule address? b. In what way does it help with that problem? c. What is one kind of case where Bayesianism helps? d. What is a kind of case where Bayesianism seems less helpful? Do exercises 1–3, on Hacking page 77
